topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Introduction to Azure Synapse Analytics

topItems.title: Survey the Components of Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Survey the Components of Azure Synapse Analytics

topItems.title: Explore Azure Synapse Studio
topItems.excerpt: Explore Azure Synapse Studio

topItems.title: Design a Modern Data Warehouse using Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Synapse Analytics enables you to build Data Warehouses using modern architecture patterns.

value.excerpt: Run Azure for SAP workloads

topItems.title: Implement Azure VM-based SAP solutions
topItems.excerpt: Implement Azure VM-based SAP solutions

topItems.title: Migrate SAP workloads to Azure
topItems.excerpt: Migrate SAP workloads to Azure

topItems.title: Maintain Azure for SAP workloads

topItems.title: Implement Azure Backup for SAP workloads on Azure VMs

value.title: Work with NoSQL data in Azure Cosmos DB
value.excerpt: In this learning path, find out how to customize NoSQL data storage and distribution with the Azure portal, Cosmos DB extension, and Cosmos DB .NET Core SDK.

topItems.title: Create an Azure Cosmos DB database built to scale
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create an Azure Cosmos DB account, database, and container built to scale as your application grows.

topItems.title: Choose the appropriate API for Azure Cosmos DB
topItems.excerpt: Compare the different APIs that are available in Azure Cosmos DB, highlighting and contrasting the different scenarios that would make them a good choice for a company.

topItems.title: Insert and query data in your Azure Cosmos DB database
topItems.excerpt: Discover the Azure Cosmos DB Data Explorer tool that enables you to add or modify data. Create stored procedures in JavaScript.

topItems.title: Store and access graph data in Azure Cosmos DB with the Graph API
topItems.excerpt: Find out about creating an application with Azure Cosmos DB as a graph database, then retrieve, manipulate, and visualize graph data using Data Explorer.

value.title: Work with relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: This learning path introduces you to Azure-supported SQL-based enterprise data solutions enabling you to store and retrieve your app's data in the cloud.

topItems.title: Provision an Azure SQL database to store application data
topItems.excerpt: Find out what makes Azure SQL Database a good choice for your relational database, how to create the database from the portal and connect with Azure Cloud Shell.

topItems.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database
topItems.excerpt: Plan and implement the migration of relational data from SQL Server to Azure SQL Database. Select the appropriate migration strategy for your database, and then use Data Migration Assistant to do the assessment and the migration.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Database for PostgreSQL
topItems.excerpt: This module is a no-code introduction to PostgreSQL on Azure, including an explanation of particular problems that using Azure Database for PostgreSQL can solve. At a high level, we show how the components fit together and identify situations where you should use Azure Database for PostgreSQL.

topItems.title: Scale multiple Azure SQL Databases with SQL elastic pools
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create SQL elastic pools and how to use them to manage performance and cost for a collection of SQL databases.

value.title: Choose the best Azure service to automate your business processes
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll discuss how to choose the appropriate Azure service to integrate and automate business processes.

value.title: Ingest, prepare & transform using Azure Databricks & Data Factory | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Today's business managers depend heavily on reliable data integration systems that run complex ETL/ELT workflows (extract, transform/load and load/transform data). Gaurav Malhotra joins Scott Hanselman to discuss how you can iteratively build, debug, deploy, and monitor your data integration workflows
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/CZQOxPY7UuA" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Automate your workflow with GitHub Actions
value.excerpt: Learn how GitHub Actions enables you to automate your software development cycle and deploy applications to Azure.

topItems.title: Introduction to GitHub
topItems.excerpt: Learn to use key GitHub features, including issues, notifications, branches, commits, and pull requests.

topItems.title: Automate development tasks by using GitHub Actions
topItems.excerpt: Create a basic GitHub Action and use that action in a workflow.

topItems.title: Build continuous integration (CI) workflows by using GitHub Actions
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create workflows that enable you to use Continuous Integration (CI) for your projects.

topItems.title: Build and deploy applications to Azure by using GitHub Actions
topItems.excerpt: Create two deployment workflows using GitHub Actions and Microsoft Azure.

value.title: AZ-400: Define and implement continuous integration
value.excerpt: Create automated pipelines that continuously build, test, and deploy your applications and prepare for Exam AZ-400: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions.

topItems.title: Create a build pipeline with Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Set up a continuous integration (CI) pipeline that automates the process of building your application.

topItems.title: Run quality tests in your build pipeline by using Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Find out about automated testing that proves your code to be maintainable, understandable, and functioning without repetitive manual testing.

topItems.title: Manage build dependencies with Azure Artifacts
topItems.excerpt: In this module, the Space Game web team guides you through creating a build pipeline that produces a package that can be used by multiple applications.

topItems.title: Host your own build agent in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Work with guidance from the Space Game web team to set up your build agent running on-premises or on an Azure virtual machine running in the cloud.

value.title: Azure SQL fundamentals
value.excerpt: Learn how to deploy, secure, monitor and troubleshoot Azure SQL database.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure SQL
topItems.excerpt: This module introduces Azure SQL. Learn about various deployment options and service tiers and what to use for your organization.

topItems.title: Deploy and configure servers, instances, and databases for Azure SQL
topItems.excerpt: Deploy and configure servers, instances, and databases for Azure SQL

topItems.title: Secure your data with Azure SQL
topItems.excerpt: Secure your data with Azure SQL

topItems.title: Deliver consistent performance with Azure SQL
topItems.excerpt: Deliver consistent performance with Azure SQL

value.title: Build mixed reality digital twins with Azure Digital Twins and Unity
value.excerpt: Learn how to create a mixed reality HoloLens 2 application using Azure Digital Twins and Unity, a real-time 3D platform.

topItems.title: Set up a mixed reality project for Azure Digital Twins in Unity
topItems.excerpt: Get step-by-step guidance on how to set up and configure a mixed reality project in Unity for HoloLens 2. Learn about the Azure Digital Twins and SignalR services and common use cases for the Azure platform in Mixed Reality.

topItems.title: Build a 3D Scene for mixed reality in Unity
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create a 3D Scene in Unity using the Microsoft Maps SDK or static terrain. Get familiar with mixed reality scene design, the Unity interface, and deploying your Unity project to a HoloLens 2.

topItems.title: Configure 3D assets for mixed reality in Unity
topItems.excerpt: Get step-by-step instructions on how to place Prefab 3D assets and models into a Unity scene. Learn about Unity Scriptable Objects and mixed reality design considerations before deploying to a HoloLens 2.

topItems.title: Connect IoT data to HoloLens 2 with Azure Digital Twin and Unity
topItems.excerpt: Stream simulated operational telemetry data from physical assets to Azure Digital Twin and visualize data in Unity and the HoloLens.

value.title: Building Open Source Software (OSS) Analytics Solutions with Azure HDInsight
value.excerpt: Building Open Source Software (OSS) Analytics Solutions with Azure HDInsight

topItems.title: Introduction to the Open source Analytics Offering
topItems.excerpt: Introduction to the Open source Analytics Offering

topItems.title: Choose the correct HDInsight Configuration to build open-source analytics solutions
topItems.excerpt: Choose the correct HDInsight Configuration to build open-source analytics solutions

topItems.title: Creating and configuring a HDInsight cluster
topItems.excerpt: Creating and configuring a HDInsight Cluster

topItems.title: Run Petabyte level OSS NoSQL databases with HDInsight HBase
topItems.excerpt: Run Petabyte level OSS NoSQL databases with HDInsight HBase

value.title: Create an enterprise-scale architecture in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore how to create Azure landing zone architecture at enterprise scale.

topItems.title: Introduction to enterprise-scale landing zones in the Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure
topItems.excerpt: The Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure provides many landing zone options. In this module, we'll focus on enterprise-scale landing zones.

topItems.title: Enterprise-scale architecture organizational design principles
topItems.excerpt: Enterprise-scale architecture organizational design principles

topItems.title: Enterprise-scale architecture networking design principles
topItems.excerpt: Enterprise-scale architecture networking design principles

topItems.title: Enterprise-scale architecture operational design principles
topItems.excerpt: Enterprise-scale architecture operational design principles

value.title: Deploy applications with Azure DevOps
value.excerpt: Learn how to configure release pipelines that continuously build, test, and deploy your applications.

topItems.title: Create a release pipeline in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Set up a continuous delivery (CD) pipeline that automates the process of deploying your application.

topItems.title: Create a multistage pipeline by using Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Design and create a realistic release pipeline that promotes changes to various testing and staging environments.

topItems.title: Manage database changes in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Use a release approval in Azure Pipelines to help coordinate database schema changes between developers and database administrators.

topItems.title: Run functional tests in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Run Selenium UI tests, a form of functional testing, in Azure Pipelines.

value.title: Develop and deploy applications on Kubernetes
value.excerpt: Create, deploy, and maintain Kubernetes-native applications using AKS.

topItems.title: Deploy a containerized application on Azure Kubernetes Service
topItems.excerpt: Explore how to create and deploy a containerized application by using Azure Kubernetes Service declarative manifest files.

topItems.title: Application and package management using Helm
topItems.excerpt: Helm is an application package manager for Kubernetes that you use to standardize and simplify the deployment of cloud-native applications on Kubernetes. Here you'll see how to install third-party packages called Helm charts and how to create and install Helm charts for the workloads your teams develop.

topItems.title: Configure an Azure Kubernetes Service deployment pipeline using GitHub Actions
topItems.excerpt: Explore how to create an automated deployment pipeline by using GitHub Actions along with Azure Kubernetes Service.

topItems.title: Deploy and manage a stateful application using CosmosDB and Azure Kubernetes Service
topItems.excerpt: Create and manage a stateful application with an external storage using CosmosDB and Azure Kubernetes Service

value.title: Get started with blockchain development
value.excerpt: Learn about blockchain and development on the Ethereum platform. Discover what skills you need to begin building your own blockchain networks at scale.

topItems.title: Introduction to blockchain on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Introduction to blockchain on Azure. See how blockchain allows business partners to trust each other's data without a central authority. You'll also learn a bit about how blockchain works. The goal is to help you decide if blockchain is a good choice for your scenario.

topItems.title: Learn how to use Solidity
topItems.excerpt: Discover how Solidity can help you program smart contracts for the Ethereum blockchain platform.

topItems.title: Write Ethereum smart contracts by using Solidity
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to install tools that you can use to develop smart contracts.

topItems.title: Create tokens using OpenZeppelin
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the significance of tokens and how they are used in blockchain.

value.title: Migrate application workloads and data to Azure
value.excerpt: Migrate application workloads and data to Azure

topItems.title: Design your migration to Azure
topItems.excerpt: Minimize the time and resources required to migrate your on-premises environment to Azure. Assess your current systems with Azure Migrate, and migrate them with Azure Migrate and Azure Database Migration Service.

topItems.title: Prepare on-premises workloads for migration to Azure
topItems.excerpt: Prepare on-premises workloads for migration to Azure

topItems.title: Migrate on-premises workloads to Azure
topItems.excerpt: Migrate on-premises workloads to Azure

topItems.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database
topItems.excerpt: Plan and implement the migration of relational data from SQL Server to Azure SQL Database. Select the appropriate migration strategy for your database, and then use Data Migration Assistant to do the assessment and the migration.

value.title: SAP certified offerings for Azure
value.excerpt: As an IT Professional experienced in SAP solutions, you need to learn about how to leverage Azure resources that include virtual machines, virtual networks, storage accounts, and Azure AD. These modules will give you the Azure knowledge around SAP Workloads, the certified offerings in Azure, and how to utilize IAAS support for your SAP workloads.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure for SAP workloads
topItems.excerpt: With the recently expanded partnership between Microsoft and SAP, you can run SAP applications across development, test, and production scenarios in Azure, taking advantage of the scalability, flexibility, and cost savings of Microsoft Azure.

topItems.title: Deploy SAP certified offerings on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Azure provides a scalable, compliant, and enterprise-proven platform for a range of SAP workloads. In this module, you explore the platform compliance criteria that is stipulated by SAP before deploying SAP solutions in Azure, and look at the different options for deploying SAP in Azure.

topItems.title: Using IAAS support with Azure for SAP workloads
topItems.excerpt: There are a variety of commonly used SAP-certified operating systems supported by SAP running on Azure VMs, and there are also several different methods of provisioning storage for SAP workloads in Azure. In this module, you will learn the SAP recommended support products and VM types as well as the network, database, and monitoring requirements.

topItems.title: SAP HANA on Azure Compute, Network, and Storage
topItems.excerpt: AP HANA on Azure (Large Instances) provides virtual machines for deploying and running SAP HANA. This module explores the SAP HANA on Azure (Large Instances) solution that builds on assigned, non -shared host/server bare -metal hardware.

value.title: SC-200 part 5: Configure your Azure Sentinel environment
value.excerpt: SC-200 part 5: Configure your Azure Sentinel environment

topItems.excerpt: Get familiar with Azure Sentinel, a cloud-native, security information and event management (SIEM) service.

topItems.title: Query logs in Azure Sentinel

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Security
value.excerpt: Discover the tools that Azure provides to help you design a secure environment throughout your infrastructure, data, network, and applications.

value.title: Connect an app to Azure Storage
value.excerpt: Create a simple application and add configuration, client library references, and C# or JavaScript code to connect it to Azure Storage.

value.title: Create an Azure Storage account
value.excerpt: Discover ways to use an Azure Storage account to manage your data for billing, access, and storage location of your blobs, files, queues, and tables.

value.title: Introduction to Linux on Azure
value.excerpt: Discover the unique benefits of running Linux on Azure, and how to run Linux-based applications and workloads in the cloud with Azure.

value.title: Introduction to Docker containers
value.excerpt: Introduction to Docker containers

value.title: Manage virtual machines with the Azure CLI
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the cross-platform Azure CLI to create, start, stop, and perform other management tasks related to virtual machines in Azure.

value.title: How to get started with Azure API Management | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to get started with Azure API Management, a service that helps protect and manage your APIs.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips     Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today

value.title: Accelerate cloud adoption with the Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure
value.excerpt: Do you need a clear path forward for your cloud journey? This learning path includes best practice guidance to help you create a cloud strategy, define a cloud adoption plan, prepare your cloud environment with proper governance, and implement cloud operations in alignment with your organizational needs.  Cloud architects and IT professionals will learn and engage with the proven best practices, tools, and documentation in the Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure to build the technical knowledge needed to help your organization successfully adopt the cloud and meet business goals.

topItems.title: Getting started with the Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure
topItems.excerpt: CAF getting started. Use the Cloud Adoption Framework getting started guides to unblock your organization’s cloud adoption efforts

topItems.title: Prepare for successful cloud adoption with a well-defined strategy
topItems.excerpt: Success in cloud adoption is predicated by a clear strategy that helps the team understand executive direction and regularly measure progress. This module will help capture the cloud adoption strategy needed to drive your success.

topItems.title: CAF Plan: Prepare for cloud adoption with a data-driven plan.
topItems.excerpt: Prepare for cloud adoption with a data driven, cloud adoption plan from CAF. For new innovations, learn from others who have used the target platforms. For migrations, understand how to evaluate your assets and plan the efforts required to move them to the cloud.

topItems.title: Choose the best Azure landing zone to support your cloud operations requirements
topItems.excerpt: Azure landing zones help accelerate configuration of your environment to meet your operational requirements.

value.title: AZ-400: Manage source control
value.excerpt: Use GitHub to build a modern source control strategy and prepare for Exam AZ-400: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions.

topItems.title: Introduction to GitHub
topItems.excerpt: Learn to use key GitHub features, including issues, notifications, branches, commits, and pull requests.

topItems.title: Migrate your repository by using GitHub best practices
topItems.excerpt: Learn to move your existing project to GitHub from a legacy version control system.

topItems.title: Upload your project by using GitHub best practices
topItems.excerpt: Learn to upload your existing project to GitHub.

topItems.title: Manage repository changes by using pull requests on GitHub
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to manage changes to your repository source by using pull requests.
